titleStmt.title: A discourse of auxiliary beauty. Or artificiall hansomenesse. In point of conscience between two ladies.
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.
Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667,
Walker, Obadiah, 1616-1699,

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R: Royston, at the Angel in Ivie-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Also sometimes attributed to Jeremy Taylor and to Obadiah Walker.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
